skdetail:

Invocation Name: the adventure story
des:
Play an interactive adventure-themed story with sound effects and prompts. Get ready for laughs and giggles as players fill in the blanks.
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
